alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 26 at 9:59AM MST until December 27 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM MST THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 MPH with gusts up to 70 MPH possible. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
